snippet.title: Space Docker VR -- Official Game Trailer [ SteamVR, Oculus Quest ]
snippet.description:
A space flight simulator for VR where you’ll utilize a virtual cockpit to master realistic space physics!

Buy now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1728830/Space_Docker_VR/
Wishlist on Oculus App Lab Soon!

About the game:
Space Docker is a “Newtonian physics” space-flight simulator for VR! Get in the cockpit, pilot a spacecraft, navigate hazardous environments, and compete with your friends to become the ultimate docker!

Features
 - Career Mode: authored missions with unique twists to train and test your docking abilities
 - Additional Procedural Content: Weekly missions, as well as 'on-demand' random jobs
 - Race Mode: push your flying skills to the max
 - Re-bindable Virtual Cockpit Controls (*HOTAS/Controller support coming soon)
 - Compete via Friends/Global Leaderboards
 - Unlockable Steam Achievements

Follow us:
Discord: https://discord.gg/N4keTnEKtC
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/CatCommandos

#SpaceDockerVR #SDVR #CatCommandos #gaming #VR #gametrailer
